website_summaries.verdict: Extremely versatile, with options for both solar and USB charging. Plus, you can use the energy it collects to charge your phone. It features a soft, frosted shade, so it's not as hard on the eyes as other models.
pros: Equipped with USB port for 2-way charging
Lasts up to 50 hours on a single 14-hour solar charge
Charges in 2 to 3 hours via USB
Top and bottom straps for clipping or hanging
USB option adds value, gives flexibility
cons: Inflation valve and USB port keep it from lying flat

customer_reviews.title: Great Lights and Excellent for Camping
customer_reviews.text: I’m a fan of the Luci lights. I actually have 5 of their Luci Lux. The Pro Series is great and I love that you can charge it with a USB cable. What I don’t like is that the plastic cover on the USB port is not great. You can see in the picture that the plastic cover is broken. Other than that, Luci Lights are great and I highly recommend them for any outdoor activities, specially camping.
customer_reviews.author: Ramoar8

customer_reviews.title: Please Read.......WE LOVE LUCI PRODUCTS...but this is the first one we had a problem with.
customer_reviews.text: Love this and couldn't wait to get it.... but I have a problem right now with it. I got it for my son....Just gave it to him for his 3year anniversary at work on the 17th July....problem is that it is leaking air. I tried putting clear tape on the seam....but it is still losing air. You can feel the air coming out of the bottom seam. Can I exchange it???? For some reason there is no "Return" option on this item. Please advise.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie King

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights. I can charge my Iphone 5s from 14% to 100% in about an hour. The quality of light is a bright warm flood and not the cool blue LED look. They are very lightweight and are replacing all my camping lanterns. They will not sit flat due to the inflation valves and USB port. They do no provide great side light but as an overhead flood they are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Kaztheatre

customer_reviews.title: Charger does not work
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product for the charger part. This was a bday gift for my sister and after they sampled how it would work they took it on a trip to San Felipe and the charger part stopped working after the first day of a 2 week road trip. I wish I could return it, but it looks like the deadline for returns has passed. Now its just an expensive blowup solar light. Bummed.
customer_reviews.author: silring

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent light. Very easy to use and bright. Being able to recharge the light using the USB is a plus. And an added benefit is being able to charge a cell phone from the light.
customer_reviews.author: Rider1992

customer_reviews.title: Better and Better Solar Light
customer_reviews.text: I already have two other MPOWERD lights and love them. This new-fangled one adds some great functionality, like two-way charging, which comes in handy. Many will use the Lux light for camping, though I find it great for indoor uses too, like for reading or even for a baby nursery, believe it or not - the frosted sides create an excellent soft light that doesn't wake anyone up and doesn't require a cord.
customer_reviews.author: GMJr

customer_reviews.title: mellow light, long lasting charge, easy to carry around, etc.
customer_reviews.text: I'm from California. We're having a lot of black outs. This Luci was/is amazing. It holds a charge for a long time. (I like the solar backup quality) I like the 'look' of the light: yellow/mellow (really don't like the bluish glare of a cheaper light we also purchased. And although the light is mellow it illuminates & husband and I read by it. BTW: we're keeping the cheaper one by another manufacturer, because it charges much faster (also loses its charge at the same speed). Between the 2 of them we feel that aspect of zero electricity is taken care of. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: An ordinary being

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made product but does not last anywhere near the advertised length of time, so is only really suitable as an emergency backup, disappointing
customer_reviews.author: David E. Southon

customer_reviews.title: Great Light, Horrible USB Connection
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a week-long camping trip and once the light arrived, I opened it to test the USB connection and it worked fine. Thinking I could rely on this to last at least the week with continued solar charging, I brought this along only to find the USB connection would no longer work after 1 charge. It said the light needed to have more than 1 bar of juice for the USB to work. I left the light out for a full day in the sun and by nightfall, it had 3 bars. That said, the USB would not connect to anything. I tried 2 different cables and 2 different phones. Lame.
customer_reviews.author: engleprunt

customer_reviews.title: Great companion at home or any trip
customer_reviews.text: I’m impressed with this product. Everyone should have at least one at home. Despite of camping this is a must have on any trip. The light is pleasant warm. It holds lots of hours I mean more than 48 hours on the lower option. I was on a trip and the light was shut off by a lightning. My kids ran to this mpower and we were comfortable waiting for the light coming back. It has so many applications that it’s hard to imagine.
customer_reviews.author: Joao P. Gasparian

customer_reviews.title: Compact and can charge a device in an emergency
customer_reviews.text: Love that Luci folds flat and allows you to charge a device from it’s solar charged battery. When camping I always look for items that have more than one function. Not sure why they felt the need to put the plastic handle directly over the solar panel or why they used milky plastic instead of clear plastic over the solar panel but it must get enough energy to charge the battery.
customer_reviews.author: AK Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: These lights provide great (and flexible) illumination with the ability to charge any USB device. Fantastic dual-purpose for earthquake preparedness lighting and device charging plus everyday patio lighting.
customer_reviews.author: The Min

customer_reviews.title: Great for backpacking.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a backpack trip and for around the house emergency. They hold their charge very well and just for fun chucked them into the pool with no issue. I charged them easy but strapping them to the back of the pack while climbing. They held up so far.
customer_reviews.author: JWP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent warm light perfect for camping
customer_reviews.text: Man this little light is great. I chuck it on the dash of my Jeep and blow it up and hang it from the top of my tent. Nice warm diffused LED lighting makes for a perfect tent light. I’ve only ever charged this once when I received it, it has only been charged via solar since and it’s been more than adequate for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: So excited to get use out of this!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this as a Christmas gift. Since it's cold and snowy right now we have only used it indoors... And let me tell you, my husband has used it because he couldn't put it down haha. The only thing we haven't tried is the solar charging. The light has different dimming settings which will be useful in a tent and it does get pretty small when it's deflated.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: love LUCI products, but this FAILS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive this as I have several LUCI lanterns and string lights.. I was particularly excited, because it would charge my iPhone while camping... Well to my disappointment, this product FAILS. not only is the light VERY dim, it does not charge at all when left in sunlight for >12hours.. all the other LUCI lanterns when charged that long worked perfectly... I would like to return and receive a FULL refund, as this is a FAIL to the LUCI line of devices......
customer_reviews.author: Denise Dorsheimer

customer_reviews.title: BUY MANY!! - Most useful and amazing product ever.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely one of the best things I have ever bought. I’ve now purchased roughly 10, I give them as gifts. I love this company and that it supports those in need. I wish I could get other solar appliances that works as well. You will truly be amazed, it works even better than described.
customer_reviews.author: Henslee W.

customer_reviews.title: This solar lamp has a charger
customer_reviews.text: Charger on this solar lamp does not charge quickly, but it does charge, great for emergencies if you electricity goes during a blackout. The lamp lasts all night. Haven't tested how long it lasts, this lamp did not die on me for 8 hrs of use. During day, you simply leave on your car dash or hang it up towards the sun. Awesome how skinny it gets when you collapse it. This would be great for people who go hiking and want to save room in their bag. You don't need to bring a Kerosene lamp with a few of these. The light is very bright. Happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Emanuel

customer_reviews.title: doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: these are AMAZING- for a couple months. wonderful warm light, brightest setting is VERY bright- then they leak and won’t stay inflated and the batteries take a dump and won’t charge. very dissapointed after being so thrilled to begin with
customer_reviews.author: michael norris

customer_reviews.title: Works but is about useless for recharging a cell phone
customer_reviews.text: Takes 18+ hours of full sun to fully recharge the batteries. batteries were used each night with good light but unable to build a charge to help with cell recharge.
customer_reviews.author: monte w bishoff

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Light
customer_reviews.text: I have about 10 of these now. I keep a couple in vehicles for emergencies and a couple with our home emergency supplies. They work great and will last a surprisingly long time.
customer_reviews.author: Tom D. Nicolos

customer_reviews.title: Nice, light weight, bright light
customer_reviews.text: The light and battery work great. The solar charger has been a bit disappointing. I was remote camping and had it in the sun all day and only seemed to go up 1 bar in charge. More use needs to be done to be sure. Otherwise very nice light.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: This light only operated for five minutes before shutting off on its very first camping trip. The buttons won’t work now and it doesn’t turn on again no matter how long it is charged for. I never got to use it properly and it’s outside the return window. I’m very disappointed that I wasted my money on this. It’s clearly a defective product. Steer clear!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay S

customer_reviews.title: SO FAR SO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: This light is bright but it took me 4 days to charge it due to a lack of sun here. I have not used it but once not sure how long it holds the charge. I will report back when I have used it more.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great lights!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are bright enough to light up a whole room. Bought one to start and then ordered two more. No more batteries for hurricanes and camping!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: MPOWERD solar light/charger
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing additionn to my power outage repetoire. I have two now and keep them both fully charged by sitting them on my kitchen window shelf. Having the added usb port makes the device more versatile during a power outage. It does draw the charge more quickly than just having the light on. Hence, the two devices, one in use while the other is the backup, Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: mysterymaeven

customer_reviews.title: Phone charger is no good
customer_reviews.text: A great idea but poor execution. Sure, it gives good illumination but the phone charger aspect is questionable in that it usually stops working within a year of purchase. I've bought three of these now and am hoping they can fix this issue. I use it to recharge my phone in the backcountry and need it to be more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: Amazon has this as a package of TWO, but you only get ONE light
customer_reviews.text: didn't realize until now that I only got one light and the listing shows that it should be a "pack of 2". The light is great- much brighter and warmer than our older generation Luci lights, and I would definitely buy another one- but would like to know the item price before I do again!
customer_reviews.author: VTtraveler

customer_reviews.title: Emergency item for huracanes season; when needed I charged them and doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I ordered for huracanes season . I buy 3 of them charged them and came damaged . Return window closed I lost my money . Just one turn on . Other two just identify the charge . The USB port of one that turn on doesn’t work neither ... so sad . I wasted my money 🙁
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Nice gadget
customer_reviews.text: It works just described. Light weight. Compact. Seems to be well-known. I purchased it after summer was over, so I didn't really put it to the test yet.
customer_reviews.author: Nita

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift to my brother-in-law and he loves it. He didn’t charge his phone with it yet. Update: it does charge the phone. Pretty quickly he said. It came in handy during the hurricane.
customer_reviews.author: MoJo

customer_reviews.title: Very slowly Charging in the Sun
customer_reviews.text: It provides a nice light but compared with another very similar light this one is charging very slowly in the sun. I charged both lights side by side under the same conditions. Charging via USB is OK.
customer_reviews.author: D.H.

customer_reviews.title: Light works but charger does NOT work
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp, large, very bright, charged easily but the USB charger stopped working after the first charge. Didn’t work even with full solar battery charge so my phone died on our camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: sarah nadler

customer_reviews.title: Hole in lantern after one use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for a long road trip. I blew it up when it first arrived, and really liked it. I put it in a bag and packed up my car. When I went to use it the second time, it deflated within 10 minutes. A hole in the product caused this. I taped the hole and it still wont work hold. I liked the idea and the warm lantern for camping, but unhappy with the quality of the product. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: K Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Light
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I was able to charge it using the USB cable before I went camping. I was gone for 4 nights and it still had juice when I got back, though I only used it for light (not charging other devises). Multiple light settings. Only camplaint is that the on/off button is hard to find by feel but I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Handy
customer_reviews.text: This lantern is great! It can get surprisingly bright, and is incredibly lightweight. I love that it is collapsible so it doesn't take up a lot of space in our camping bin or backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Roach

customer_reviews.title: Worked once then never charged back up again
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a camping trip that got postponed a couple months so i didn't get to fully discharge the battery until my window of return was over. Now it wont charge past the first led indicator sitting in direct sunlight for days. Very unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Don S

customer_reviews.title: Great lights!
customer_reviews.text: I love MPowerd lights. The built in battery is a great feature as is the plug in to charge. Now I don't have to worry around having enough sunshine to charge them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Ashura

customer_reviews.title: Works for hurricane
customer_reviews.text: I got an older model years ago for Christmas and charged it but never really used it. This past year we had a hurricane and were with out power for 3 days and this thing started right up when I pulled it out and was plenty of light. Bought this one after to have one with a charger and have checked it out a few times and seems to work just as well. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Defective unit?
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Not sure if the one I received was defective but worked well out of the box but won’t hold battery life charge after sitting in the sun all day to recharge the solar panel...😡
customer_reviews.author: Katherine D.

customer_reviews.title: Not as well designed as original Luci
customer_reviews.text: the on/off switches are almost imperceptible to touch. So, in the dark, when you may want a light, you need a light to find the on switch. The charging feature is a nice option.
customer_reviews.author: David Kmetovic

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't charge fully
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these a while back and it wouldn't fully charge in the sun so I replaced it with another one and the one also doesn't fully charge in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Hofling

customer_reviews.title: Stops holding charge quickyl
customer_reviews.text: It stopped charging after very minimal use. Same with my other Lucy product. I stored them properly etc. very disappointed by this expensive dud
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Pexton

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: The product is so clever & perfect for camping & backpacking. Contacted CS. Got immediate answers & solution to my issue. Best customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Air Valve Leaks ! ! !
customer_reviews.text: Cheap leaky air fill valve. Plug will not stay in. Leaks air. Very big problem on a seven night camping trip! Should have a screw down air valve.
customer_reviews.author: HJK

customer_reviews.title: Love the Lucy lights, had purchased some before and they work great! Would recommend purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Love the Lucy lights, had purchased some before and they work great! Would recommend purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna Roberts

customer_reviews.title: poor endurance
customer_reviews.text: I put the device in the sunshine all day (8am to 4PM). I did this several days in a row and each time I used the lite at night, it went off after about 1 hour. Something is wrong. I am going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary F Caron

customer_reviews.title: Purchase!  Fun and Functional!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it! He is a plumber and uses it inside cabinets and it is super helpful compared to a flashlight.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Goodmon

customer_reviews.title: Charged a diabetes pump
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing for my daughter’s three week trek in the Grand Canyon. It provided light, was waterproof and charged her diabetes pump.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: Had multiple leaks. I took it on a trip into the Grand Canyon so by the time I got home I couldn’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: David M Schuster

customer_reviews.title: Customer for Life
customer_reviews.text: Works beautifully! Charged on a cold, January day and worked as expected! Can’t wait for camping season! I don’t intend on ever purchasing any other lantern other than Luci Lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Ucchik7

customer_reviews.title: Best camp light ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Best camp light I have! Very light and bright! I need to buy a couple more!!❤
customer_reviews.author: C.R. Mayfield

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: We had purchased this for our home emergency kit. Worked great during power outages, very bright, lightweight, and compact storage.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I charged it completely and then went on a 10-day camping bike trip in France. I would usually put it in the sun after reaching camp, and then hook my mobile phone into it. It provided light and phone service for the whole trip. It should be mentioned that I only had the phone turned on for 1-2 hours each day. I am doing a similar trip in a few weeks and have ordered a second one. Each family member has at least one of these, and yes, one got punctured but is still usable, for both lighting and charging.
customer_reviews.author: Plasbo

product_meta.title: MPOWERD Luci Base: All-in-One Solar Inflatable Light + Phone Charger
feature_bullets: Luci Pro: Lux effortlessly combines versatility, durability and elegant design to make every adventure epic. Set it in direct sunlight for 14 hours or charge via the two-way USB port in 2-3 hours and Luci Pro: Lux lasts up to 50 hours on a single charge
With 10 warm white LEDs, Luci Pro: Lux is a clean, reliable source of light with mobile charging that will let you go further than ever before
4 modes for any need: low, medium, high, 1 second flashing
USB port for two-way charging (two-way USB cord included)
Perfect for camping, hiking, kayaking, boating, fishing, emergency kits, pool & patio lighting and as a unique gift
Weighs less than most mobile phones at 5.5 oz. / 156 g

Luci Pro Lux is ideal for any emergency situation, especially when the unexpected happens. Rechargeable, durable, and waterproof (rated IP67), Luci Pro Lux can be used as a tool for both first responders and those directly impacted.
Battery level indicator that lets you know exactly when to recharge your light
MPOWERD offers a 1-year manufacturer’s warranty on all MPOWERD products sold by authorized sellers

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
